The claim was published on Facebook on A: 2020, and was shared more than 23,000 times.
The post: s Malay-language caption translates to English as "TIPS FOR HEADACHE" and advises against taking Panadol painkillers.
The post suggests alternative methods fo: such as washing the head with cold water, drinking warm water, and taking a short nap.
Medical experts: including Dr. Ahmad Firdaus Mohd Haris and Muhammad Azmi Abdul Wahab, state that Panadol and other paracetamol-based pain relievers are safe when taken in the correct dosage and do not have addictive properties. They emphasize the importance of following recommended dosages and seeking medical attention if symptoms persist.
